(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Just))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD posed)
        (NP (DT this) (NN question))
        (PP (IN on)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NN facebook) (NN page))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBD got)
        (NP (DT a) (JJ tremendous) (NN response))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(posed-2, Just-1)
root(ROOT-0, posed-2)
det(question-4, this-3)
dobj(posed-2, question-4)
prep(posed-2, on-5)
poss(page-8, our-6)
nn(page-8, facebook-7)
pobj(on-5, page-8)
cc(posed-2, and-9)
conj(posed-2, got-10)
det(response-13, a-11)
amod(response-13, tremendous-12)
dobj(got-10, response-13)


(ROOT
  (S (CC So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (VP (VBG posting)
        (NP
          (NP (DT this))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (DT the) (NN blog))))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NN order)))
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB gauge)))
          (, ,))))))


cc(posting-4, So-1)
nsubj(posting-4, I-2)
aux(posting-4, am-3)
root(ROOT-0, posting-4)
dobj(posting-4, this-5)
prep(this-5, on-6)
det(blog-8, the-7)
pobj(on-6, blog-8)
prep(posting-4, in-9)
pobj(in-9, order-10)
aux(gauge-12, to-11)
xcomp(posting-4, gauge-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RBR more))
    (VP (VBZ precisely))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(precisely-2, more-1)
root(ROOT-0, precisely-2)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADJP (WRB how) (JJ much))
    (S
      (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS foodies))
      (ADVP (RB here))
      (VP (VBP love)
        (NP (NN seafood))))
    (. .)))


advmod(much-2, how-1)
dep(love-6, much-2)
poss(foodies-4, our-3)
nsubj(love-6, foodies-4)
advmod(love-6, here-5)
root(ROOT-0, love-6)
dobj(love-6, seafood-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (RB So))
    (VP (VBP tell)
      (NP (PRP us)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(tell-2, So-1)
root(ROOT-0, tell-2)
dobj(tell-2, us-3)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADJP (WRB how) (JJ much))
    (SQ (VBP do)
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VB like)
        (NP (NNP Seafood))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(much-2, how-1)
dep(like-5, much-2)
aux(like-5, do-3)
nsubj(like-5, you-4)
root(ROOT-0, like-5)
dobj(like-5, Seafood-6)
